subSubSection.paragraph: Type material. MNHN-IM-2000-483 and MNHN-IM-2000-503, syntypes .

Remarks. The genus
Triphoris
is of feminine gender, therefore the name should be
Triphoris ornata
.

Hervier (1899) reported this species from New Caledonia but this is an Atlantic/Caribbean species. The record of this species from the Suez Canal by Cooke (1885) is likely a misidentification (see also RolÃ¡n & FernÃ¡ndez-GarcÃ©s 2008: 90 ). The record from Bermuda by OdÃ© (1989) is an incorrect citation of another source and therefore should be disregarded.
